item.description: WELCOME TO Boston Meetup ! Boston Meetup is for friends, both new&old,to get together and enjoy the evening,a fun/social night out!From movies to dinner,drinks a bar club,games(Red Sox)or Concerts&Theatre,lots of exciting events!We are looking to live life to the fullest & enjoy the finer things that our great city has to offer while making new friends at the same time! We will have annual Cruises,and trips/ Getaways and special events,but open to other suggestions/ideas,email me at FunMeetup@gmail.com Invite your friends to join, BostonMeetup.org Email Greg at FunMeetup@gmail.com your phone#(in case of last minute changes), Most of our members are in our 20's&30's,but the group is open to everyone from all ages!(Some events maybe age specific/21+ , Vacations are usually 20s,30s and 40s) ----------- I'm sure we all miss the big groups of coed friends we had in high school or college...so let's start over!Just a big fun group of people wanting to have a good time&meet new friends! Invite your friends to join us, BostonMeetup.org
item.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org
